about_the_game:
This dls continues the basic story of the Halloween Incident.

Storyline

This episode tells the story from the perspective of a police officer who has found a maniac's lair and is trying to single-handedly apprehend him.

Gameplay

All of the game mechanics in this episode are tied to point and click. You need to solve logical puzzles and gradually uncover the plot.

Important!

You can go through the episodes in any order, even without playing the main part. This game is one big puzzle, where you can put together the story and solve all the mysteries yourself.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent violence, General mature content, Shocking or frightening elements.

Contains scenes of explicit violence and gore.
